FluentXMLReport.SolverSettings:
Solver Settings ---------------
Equations
Equation Solved ------------------- Flow yes Turbulence yes Energy yes P1 yes
Numerics
Numeric Enabled --------------------------------------- Absolute Velocity Formulation yes
Pseudo Transient Explicit Relaxation Factors
Variable Relaxation Factor ---------------------------------------------- Density 1 Body Forces 1 Turbulent Kinetic Energy 0.75 Turbulent Dissipation Rate 0.75 Turbulent Viscosity 1 Energy 0.75 P1 1 Explicit Momentum 0.5 Explicit Pressure 0.5
Linear Solver
Variable Solver Type Termination Criterion Residual Reduction Tolerance ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Flow F-Cycle 0.1 Turbulent Kinetic Energy F-Cycle 0.1 Turbulent Dissipation Rate F-Cycle 0.1 Energy F-Cycle 0.1 P1 F-Cycle 0.1
Pressure-Velocity Coupling
Parameter Value -------------------------- Type Coupled Pseudo Transient yes
Discretization Scheme
Variable Scheme ------------------------------------------------ Pressure PRESTO! Momentum Second Order Upwind Turbulent Kinetic Energy First Order Upwind Turbulent Dissipation Rate First Order Upwind Energy Second Order Upwind
Solution Limits
Quantity Limit -------------------------------------- Minimum Absolute Pressure 1 Maximum Absolute Pressure 5e+10 Minimum Temperature 1 Maximum Temperature 5000 Minimum Turb. Kinetic Energy 1e-14 Minimum Turb. Dissipation Rate 1e-20 Maximum Turb. Viscosity Ratio 1e+08
